title: No reward for winning a game(xp wise)
body: i have played two games and one win one loss in normals, then i check the xp and i gain like 20 more xp for winning can someone explain that to me?

replies.body: There isn't anywhere near as much difference in the rewards for win/loss than there was in the previous system. The only big advantage for winning is in the FWotD now. I believe the idea is to ease the burden on casual players, both in actual experience and in satisfaction since they have less opportunities to win a game each day.
but seemingly why would riot do this people should get rewarded for playing well, i had two games one win one loss, 12/2/4 222xp and one that game/5/4/4 211xp loss that doesn't seem right.

The rewards for playing well lie more in the mastery system than the BE/EXP system. If you do well in normals you're recognised with S ranks, more mastery points, tokens and the like. In ranked wins get you LP. EXP is more about just playing and enjoying the game.
by getting level 7 you have to use 3900 BE. that you have to level up to get. you need a reward because it takes way too long to level up a champ to level 6 even
